345a1(mdo 'grel): bam po drug bcu drug pa// / rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnams par gzigs nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
345a2(mdo 'grel): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byolo song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong bar byed cing / de lo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
345a3(mdo 'grel): chen po dri dag yan lag dang nying lag bcad cing btubs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
345a4(mdo 'grel): po de dag gi sha zos nas de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa thob pa dang / de dag byams pa thob pa nges byol song gi skye gnas nas rna ldang rnar longs nas lha dang mi'i nang du skye ba
345a5(mdo 'grel): dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mnyes por byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan
345a6(mdo 'grel): 'das de dag la chos thos te/ dri bzhin nyid na tran du byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thag pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gi phung po ma lus
345b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
345b2(mdo 'grel): byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byung po de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o// rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas su gyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho dang /
345b3(mdo 'grel): nub dang / byang drang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub phyed dang / 'og ngong steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
345b4(mdo 'grel): po dag byol so ngo gi skye gnas su gtags pa' sems can pa dag gis byed pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong bar byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
345b5(mdo 'grel): dag yan lag dnganying lag bcang cing btubs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas nasu gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
345b6(mdo 'grel): chen po de dag gi sha zos nas de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa thob pa dang / de dag la byams pa thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing rnam par langs
346a1(mdo 'grel): nas lha dang mi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur
346a2(mdo 'grel): byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nAn tane byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/
346a3(mdo 'grel): theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
346a4(mdo 'grel): chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing de bzhin du nyid du nan tan du byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o zhes bya bA ni byol song gi skye gnas zhi bar
346a5(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa'i phrin las yin no// / rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shor phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi kham sa gang+gA'i klung gi
346a6(mdo 'grel): bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dwags kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dwags kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed tsog yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'dzi la
346b1(mdo 'grel): zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag sems can+da yi dwags kyi yul ba de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag lu byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dwags
346b2(mdo 'grel): kyi skye gnas de dang / de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dwags kyi skye gtses de dag nas rnam par longs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang mi'i sbyin du smos te phung po ma lus
346b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i mya ngan las 'dus kyi bar du sa pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / namu yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur pa drug ma thong ngo // rab 'byor ngasu 'di
346b4(mdo 'grel): nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs ni/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byung sher dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang de/ nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten
346b5(mdo 'grel): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snying dag na/ byang chub sems dpa'i senga'i chen po se naM yi dgos kyi yul rnams kyi yi dwags kyi yul de dag na sdug bskul ji snyed cig yod pa dreg thams cad rab tu 'dzi lta zhing ser sna sbyangs pa'i
346b6(mdo 'grel): chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dwagos kyi yul pa de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag
347a1(mdo 'grel): nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dwags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas de dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis b+ha 'jig rten dang / mI'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung
347a2(mdo 'grel): blopo ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bul bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // zhes bya ba ni yi dwags
347a3(mdo 'grel): kyi 'jig rten+da zhi bar mdzad pa'i 'phrin los yin no// // rab 'byor ngas 'di nis sangs rgyas kyi sbyin gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
347a4(mdo 'grel): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan
347a5(mdo 'grel): dadrang 'phrul dga' dang / gzhon 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po/ de dag lus lho'i bu dag gis chos de bris nas theg pa gsum
347a6(mdo 'grel): pos rim gyi sa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'do' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yin
347b1(mdo 'grel): tAn lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de la skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grog po dag 'du byed thams cad nI mi rtag pa// 'du
347b2(mdo 'grel): byung thams cad ni stug bsgral pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams ca ni mi bstan bya/ 'du byang thams cad ni yid bstan du mi ra / 'du byed thams cad
347b3(mdo 'grel): ni rnam par 'gyur pa'o chos can yin na/ 'du byed thams cad la lta su zhig 'bebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor dus yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi skyon gyis 'jig rten
347b4(mdo 'grel): la rnam par gzigs na/ lho dang nub dang / byung dang / shA rI dang / shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byung dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
347b5(mdo 'grel): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rgyal cheni bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dgra'
347b6(mdo 'grel): lnga na dang 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de dag las lha'i bu
348a1(mdo 'grel): de dag gyis chos de thos nas theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'ang 'a ba dang / yongs su mya
348a2(mdo 'grel): ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur par mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu grang / 'dod pa'i yon tan ldes shAs cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'ba' bar snang bar byas shing de dag skyo bIr gyur
348a3(mdo 'grel): par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsnol bA/ 'du byed thams cad ni dadag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi
348a4(mdo 'grel): brtan pa dang / 'du byed thams cad nI yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur pa'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid 'phebs par gnas shes chos
348a5(mdo 'grel): ston to/ rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye mu snyed dgra na/ byang chub
348a6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' semaso dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la/ mngon par zhen pa de dag lo// kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bstod/
348b1(mdo 'grel): chos thams cad gsog dang / gso ba sha stag la ci zhig/ lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang / bral bar byed pa de dag mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
348b2(mdo 'grel): chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor du ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab
348b3(mdo 'grel): 'byor ngas yang 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byod dang / 'og dang steng
348b4(mdo 'grel): gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnams gong tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la kye grogs po dag chos
348b5(mdo 'grel): thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba pa skyid/ chos thams cad go sog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig/ lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de drug dang bral na byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byur byung
348b6(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rab 'byor de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ snying rje chen po la gnas shing sems can rnamasol chos
349a1(mdo 'grel): ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshur rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpaSh+Ta semastu dang bla chen po rnams ste r+m+ma d+ma byung ba'i chos so// zhes bya b+hA ni l+yA'i 'gro bzhi par mdzad b+hA
349a2(mdo 'grel): 'phrin las yin no// rab 'byor sa 'di nas sang s+ya rgyu sa g+ha~M m+b+han+ti g+his 'jig rten gi rnam pa gshegs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung skye
349a3(mdo 'grel): bye ma snyed dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsla ba'i dngos po bo na srung ba mthong ste/ ba'i gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang // tshig snyan pa dang / don spyod pa da
349a4(mdo 'grel): mthunapa'o// shA byor dus 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs na/ dang // nub dang / byang dang / byung shir dang / shAr dang / ljon pa dang / byung dang /
349a5(mdo 'grel): dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams pang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyid dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de dag mo rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdong po mtho ste/ be zhig
349b1(mdo 'grel): zhe nu sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/
349b2(mdo 'grel): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gnyis kyis sems can rnams spyad de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa'o// rab 'byor ji ltar ni
349b3(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ zang zing gi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
349b4(mdo 'grel): byin pa laM spyod pa'i tshe/ gser ram/ dngul lam/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ bai Tu ts+ya 'am/ dung ngam/ man shel la mau/ b+hu ru 'am/ sa la sbram mamazlas sam/ skom myam/ gdugs
349b5(mdo 'grel): sim gos sam/ spos sam/ phreng ba 'am/ byug pa 'am/ mal cha'am/ stan nam/ bud med dam// skyes pa'am/ rta 'am/ glang po 'am/ bdag yongs su gtong na/ 'di skad kye
350a1(mdo 'grel): sems can rnams tshur shog/ bdag nyid dang 'dra bar blang mi dgos par khyer shig/ long la dengs shig ces brjod do// sbyin pa des sbyin pa byin nas sangs
350a2(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas la skyabs su gtong ngo // chos la skyabs su gtong ngo // dge 'dun la skyebs su gtong ngo // la la ni bslab pa'i gnas lnga 'dzin du 'dzud do// la la ni yan lag brgyad dang
350a3(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i gso sbyong la nye bar gnas par byed do// lA la ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rnam par 'god // le la ni bsamA gtan dang po la/ la la ni bsam gtan gnyis
350a4(mdo 'grel): pe la/ la la ni bsdam gtan gsum pa la/ la la ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la 'god do// la la ni byams pa la/ la la ni snying rje la/ la la ni dga' ba la/ la la ni btang snyoms
350a5(mdo 'grel): la 'god do// la la ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la/ la la ni cung zad med pa'i skye mched la/ lA la ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la 'god do// la la ni sangs
350a6(mdo 'grel): rgyas rjes su dran pa la/ la la ni chos rjes su dran pa la/ la la ni ngage 'dun rjes su dran pa la/ la la ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa la/ lo la ni gtong ba rjes su dran pa la/
350b1(mdo 'grel): la la ni lha rjes su dran pa lu yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni lus la mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i 'du shes so sor brtag pa lA/ la la ni 'phags pa'i lA ma yan lag brgyad ba
350b2(mdo 'grel): la yang dag par bskul lo// la la nI stong po nyid drang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / la la ni rnam par dag pa dang / la la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
350b3(mdo 'grel): lu/ la la ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / la la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi lA/ li la ni dbang po lnga la/ la la ni stobs lnga la/ la la ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la/ la la ni
350b4(mdo 'grel): stobs lnga lA/ la la nI byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la/ la la ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par bskul lo// lo la nI stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
350b5(mdo 'grel): dang / smon+da pA med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / la lA ni rnam par thar pa brgyad lA/ la la ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la/ la lA ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
350b6(mdo 'grel): la/ la li ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi la/ la la ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni byams pa chen po laM/ la la ni snying rje chen po la/ la la ni sangs
351a1(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni skyes pa chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su grub par bya ba la yang dag par bskul-I//
351a2(mdo 'grel): la la ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par bskul lo// la lA ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / la la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lA/ l-i la ni dgra bcom pa nyid la/ la la ni
351a3(mdo 'grel): rang byang chub la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni byang chub la/ la la nI lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la/ la la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yang drag par bskul lo// rab 'byor/
351a4(mdo 'grel): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / thabs mkhas pas
351a5(mdo 'grel): bla na med po'i bde ba dang ldan par 'gyod de/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
351a6(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor gnyis po 'di dag ni chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ 'jig rten dang / 'dzag
351b1(mdo 'grel): rten las 'das pa'o// rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams brjod pa dang / bshad pa dang / ma nor bar bstan pa ste/ 'di ltar mi gtsang ba'i
351b2(mdo 'grel): rnam pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / gzhan yang 'jig
351b3(mdo 'grel): rten pa'i chos byis pa so so'i skye bo dag dang thun mong du gyur pa rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des
351b4(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa de btang nas rnam grangs du mas 'jig rten gyi chos rnams ma nor bar blangs pa de lus bskyo da de/ de dag lngas bskyod nas/ thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos
351b5(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / 'phyags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu dag la rab tu 'god do// de la 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni gang / 'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu ni gang zhe na 'phags pa'i chos zhes
351b6(mdo 'grel): bya ba ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mo// 'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu dag la rab tu 'god do// de la 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni gang /
352a1(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu ni gang zhe na 'phags pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mo// 'phags
352a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
352a3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// dgra bcom pa'i 'bras
352a4(mdo 'grel): bu nyid shes pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
352a5(mdo 'grel): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// nang stong po nyid shes pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa'o// byang chub kyi phyogs
352a6(mdo 'grel): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun shes pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa
352b1(mdo 'grel): brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan+da ma med pa drang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams shes pa'o// ting nge
352b2(mdo 'grel): 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
352b3(mdo 'grel): pa bco brgyad shes pa'o// byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po shes pa'o// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las
352b4(mdo 'grel): 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis
352b5(mdo 'grel): ye shes ma rtogs pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen phye'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang
352b6(mdo 'grel): zhe na/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
353a1(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci lugs/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad
353a2(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
353a3(mdo 'grel): pa'ing thob par 'gyur // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
353a4(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag ni ci zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra bka' stsal pa/ bye brag yod do// gsol pa/ bye brag ni ji lta bu zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
353a5(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyi nga thob par 'gyur ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes brnyes pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
353a6(mdo 'grel): gang la gnas shing chos thams cad la mun pa med pa thob par la byang chub sems dpa'i sem sa kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
353b1(mdo 'grel): thugs kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med do// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ de la brten pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin
353b2(mdo 'grel): pa 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa lnga sbyor zhing thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las
353b3(mdo 'grel): 'das pa'i sbyin pa la bkod nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la 'god pa yin no zhes bya ba ni mi'i 'gro ba zhi bar mdzad pa'i 'phrin las yi na no// // rab 'byor byang chub sems
353b4(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems sa dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang mthun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang
353b5(mdo 'grel): dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lho dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
353b6(mdo 'grel): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / smon nas shes pa dang /
354a1(mdo 'grel): mngon par shes pa drug dang / yongs su dag pa bzhi dang / dbang bcu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
354a2(mdo 'grel): rig pa bzhi dang / bslang ba med pa gsum dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / nyams pa medra pa'i chos nyid dang / bag chags yang dag par bcom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
354a3(mdo 'grel): pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pu nyid dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /
354a4(mdo 'grel): gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams te/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
354a5(mdo 'grel): nang gi lus drang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su blta zhing brtson 'grus can shes pazhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ljon pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam
354a6(mdo 'grel): par bsal zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la zad pa'i rjesu lte zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjesu lta zhing rnar spyodado// /
354b1(mdo 'grel): lhas la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang la yang nye bar len pa med do// nang+ga gi tshor ba dang / phyi'i tshor ba dang / nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gi
354b2(mdo 'grel): sem sna dang / nang gi chos dang / phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pa sa 'jig rten gyi chags sems
354b3(mdo 'grel): dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal zhing rnam par spyod ngo // chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyong ngo // chos la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar
354b4(mdo 'grel): ldan pa med do// rab 'byor yang dag par spong gi bzhi gang zhe na/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa dang / skyes pa rnam par spong ba'i
354b5(mdo 'grel): phyir rtsol bya dang / dge ba'i chos mA skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed cing brtson 'gros rtsom pa dang / skyes pa rnam sA shin tu 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas par bya bA dang /
354b6(mdo 'grel): sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa'o// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byang dang ldan pa'i rdzu
355a1(mdo 'grel): 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o// rab 'byor dbang po lnga grang
355a2(mdo 'grel): gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dpung po'o// de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o// stobs
355a3(mdo 'grel): lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs te/ de dag ni stobs lde zhes bya'o// rab
355a4(mdo 'grel): 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam pa 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi
355a5(mdo 'grel): yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin du sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yon lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms
355a6(mdo 'grel): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
355b1(mdo 'grel): yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i lus kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang drug pa'i ting
355b2(mdo 'grel): nge 'dzin te/ de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ces bya'o// de la ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon
355b3(mdo 'grel): pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o// mtshan
355b4(mdo 'grel): ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe ni/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o// smon pa med pa'i ting nge
355b5(mdo 'grel): 'dzin+da gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par sems rtse gtsig+na pa ste/ de ni ston pa med pA'i tIdA nge 'dzin zhes bya'o// nAm+b+ha par thAR+Sha pa brgyad gang wA n+ta/ gzug
355b6(mdo 'grel): can gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs thams cad mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyi pa'o// ba
356a1(mdo 'grel): bar mos 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam pa tha pa bzhi pa'o// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
356a2(mdo 'grel): la nye bar bsgrub te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// 'du shing med 'du shes med mo ni skye mched
356a3(mdo 'grel): la nya bar bsgru bris te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste// de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces
356a4(mdo 'grel): bya'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di la la la 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyi dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ de dpyod pa dang bcas pa// dben pa la so skyes
356a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can// bsam gtan po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongasu dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pa rtog pa med pa dpyod
356a6(mdo 'grel): pa med pa// ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gonas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du
356b1(mdo 'grel): btang snyoms su gnas te// bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la
356b2(mdo 'grel): nye bar bsgrub sa te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongasu dag pa
356b3(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed
356b4(mdo 'grel): pas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mchod la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes na mkha' mtha' yas skye
356b5(mdo 'grel): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so// zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te// glan
356b6(mdo 'grel): so/ de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'ongs te// cung zad ma yod ngo zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam po thams cad du cung zad med pa'i
357a1(mdo 'grel): skye mched las yang dag par 'dasate/ 'du shes mang 'du shes yang mar skye mtshad la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// da rnam pa bdu du ba ste du 'du shes mang man sgyu mched las yang dag dang
357a2(mdo 'grel): 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor po 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o// de laM zad par gyi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/ zad par sa dang / zang ba
357a3(mdo 'grel): dang zad par chu dang / zad par rlung dang / zad par sngon po dang / zad par ser po dang / zad par dmar po dang Shang pArar+ya dkar po dang / zad pur rnam par shes pa dang / zad par na mkha' ste/ de dag ni zad par gyi skye mched bcu
357a4(mdo 'grel): zhes bya'o// de la zil gyis gnon pa'i skye ma tshad brgyad gang zhe na/ nang gzugs su 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha drug mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis
357a5(mdo 'grel): mnan te shes// zil gyi mnan te mthong zhing // de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o// nang gzugs su 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha dog mi sdig pa dang /
357a6(mdo 'grel): kha dog sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes// zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes
357b1(mdo 'grel): shing phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyi mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye
357b2(mdo 'grel): mched gsum pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzung dag pa dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / khya dag mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis gnan te shes/ zil gyis gnan te mthong
357b3(mdo 'grel): zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o// nang gzugs meng par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po// kha dog sngon po/ sngon por snang ba/ mdog sngon po 'di lta ste/ dper na
357b4(mdo 'grel): me tog oM ma ka lta bu'am// yul ba ra NA sIr byas pa'i gos ltar sngo ba// sngon po kha dog sngo ba/ sngon por snang ba// mdog sde ba mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes// zil gyi mnan taM mthong zhing
357b5(mdo 'grel): de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis mnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi ril gyi gzugs ser po/ kha dog ser po/ ser por snang ba/ mdog ser po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing
357b6(mdo 'grel): kuR+shi ka ri'i me tog lta bu'am// yul ba ra NA sir byas pa'i gos ltar ser ba/ kha dog ser ba/ ser bar snang ba/ mdog ser ba mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te// mthong
358a1(mdo 'grel): zhing / de ltar 'du shing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnan pa'i skye mched drug pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po/ kha dog dmyur
358a2(mdo 'grel): po/ dmar por snang ba/ mdog dmar po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ man+t+ra dzI bya ka'i me tog lta bu'am/ yul bA ra NA sir byas pa'i gos ltar dmar ba/ kha dog dmar bam dma' bar snang ba// mdog dmar bar mthong
358a3(mdo 'grel): yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs
358a4(mdo 'grel): dkar po/ kha dog dkar po/ dkar por// mdog dkar po 'di lta ste/ dper nA/ skar ma pa ba sangs kyi 'od lta bu'am/ yul ba ra NA ser byas pa'i gos ltar dkar pa/ kha dog dkar ba/ dkar bar snang ga
358a5(mdo 'grel): medag dkar bar mthong yang gzugs gzil gyis mnan te/ sa na/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing // de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis mnon pa'i skye mched brgyud pa'o// de la nyon mongs pa med
358a6(mdo 'grel): pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rnam par spyod pa sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi nyon mongs pa mi skye ba'i mthu yod pa ting nge 'dzin
358b1(mdo 'grel): gang gis 'grub pa de ni nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o// smon lam gyi shes pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas te 'di shes par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dus gsum gyi shes
358b2(mdo 'grel): ba'am/ shes pa gang dang gang 'dod par 'gyur ba de la yid kyis smon lngar byed de// ting nge 'dzin de las ldangs nas de'i smon lam de yongs su grub par gyur zhing shes bya de'ang shes pa de ni smon lam gyi shes
358b3(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bya'o// de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa drang / lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mdo
358b4(mdo 'grel): par shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rje su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa ste drug po de drug go// dri la yang su dag pa dang / sems yangs dag pa dang / ya shwas yangs
358b5(mdo 'grel): dag pa ste bzhi pa dge gi/ de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yongasasu dag pa dang / dmigs pa yongs su pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / ye shes yong su dag pa sto bzhi po de dag go//
358b6(mdo 'grel): de la dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul
359a1(mdo 'grel): la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba ste/ bcu po de dag go// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ni
359a2(mdo 'grel): gnas la yang gnas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i la
359a3(mdo 'grel): dang las yong su blangs pa'i rnam par smin pa gnas kyi rnam pa dang rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// khams sna tshogs can dang khams du ma can gyi 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta ba
359a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te// sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi dbang
359a5(mdo 'grel): po rab dang tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
359a6(mdo 'grel): dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byed pa rnam par dgod pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rnam pa du/
359b1(mdo 'grel): mar sngon gyi gnas rje su dgongs te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rje su dgongs pa na/ tshe rab brgya dang / tshe rabs stong dang / tshe rabs brgya stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba khrag khyig brgya stong gi bar du yang rje su dgongs so// bskal pa gcig kyang
359b2(mdo 'grel): rjesu dgongs pa nas/ bskal pa brgya'i dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mi'i bArA dag kyang rje su dgongs te/ bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug
359b3(mdo 'grel): 'dug go/ ming ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// rus ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur te// zas ni 'di lta bu zhig zla za'o// yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas gnaso// tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig
359b4(mdo 'grel): tu gyur te/ bdag de nas tshe 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so// zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas// sa mal dang bcas// gtan tshogs dang bcas pa rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjesu dgongs so// lha'i
359b5(mdo 'grel): mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/ sems can 'tsho 'pho ba dang / skye ba dag kyang gzigs so// kha dog sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang / bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang / ngan 'gro na 'khod
359b6(mdo 'grel): pa dang / ngan 'gro na 'khod pa dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'dod pa'i sems can rnams rab tu mkhyen te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / yid kyi ngan
360a1(mdo 'grel): spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas ngan song log par ltung bar can rgyam par rgya/ 9de dag ni lus kyi legs
360a2(mdo 'grel): bar spyod pa dang ldan pa/ gi le par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ rdzi ci de la skyed pa dang sdug 'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa yang dag pa lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha'i nang du skye'o zhes
360a3(mdo 'grel): bya bar rab tu mkhyen to// zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir seMs rnar grol dang / she rab nur grol ba dang zag pa med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobaso so//
360a4(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dge par rdzo pa rgyas can/ 'di la rje lnga yom cag 'bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/
360a5(mdo 'grel): skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag pa rje su ma mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag pa rje su ma mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rje su ma mthong bas
360a6(mdo 'grel): bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa theb pa rnam par spyod de/ khru mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor
360b1(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag zagu zad do// zhes dam
360b2(mdo 'grel): bcas na/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lce 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am// skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na
360b3(mdo 'grel): chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyuraro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjesu ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tshe ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa
360b4(mdo 'grel): rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud ngam/ tshangs pa
360b5(mdo 'grel): 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la brten na bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur
360b6(mdo 'grel): zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshas pa'o// skye gu'i cho ga gzhan sus yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ste//
361a1(mdo 'grel): rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnasu dam
361a2(mdo 'grel): bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgag go// tshungs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ tshes dang ldan par bskor bar ma
361a3(mdo 'grel): nus pa bangagi rab tu bskor bar bya'o// ga yA gis Tagi 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na sdug bsngal yang dag par zad pa 'byung bar
361a4(mdo 'grel): mi 'gyur ro zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dge'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par
361a5(mdo 'grel): rjerjesu mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa dang / me 'jigs pa thob pas rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs pa che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor
361a6(mdo 'grel): kyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten dge sbyong ngam// bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ tshis dang ldan par bskor bar mi rus pa bdag gis
361b1(mdo 'grel): rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste bzhi po de dag ni mi 'jigs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa
361b2(mdo 'grel): dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / slob pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ don la dmigs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la dmigs pa dang / spobs
361b3(mdo 'grel): pa la dmigs pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegasu pa'i bsrung ba med pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yong su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa
361b4(mdo 'grel): yong su ma dag pa mi mnga' bos la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa dang pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung gi spyod
361b5(mdo 'grel): pa yong su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi spyod pa yongasu ma dag pa mi mnga' bas la las shes su 'ong zhes gang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste//
361b6(mdo 'grel): 'di ni bsrung ba med pa gnyis pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi spyod pa yongasu ma dag pa mi mnga' bas la las shesu 'ong
362a1(mdo 'grel): ngo zhes gang yang bcab par dgos pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrungs pa med pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa/
362a2(mdo 'grel): pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i tshe// la la rna bu btud de rim gror nyan zhing bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed na yang des de bzhi
362a3(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur// yid bde bar mi 'gyur// thugs yeng yongs por mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhog pa dang po'o// la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan zhing bka' mnyan pa'i
362a4(mdo 'grel): sems nye bar gzhog pa med pa dang / chos dang gnye ba'i chos nan tan du mi byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs khro bar mi 'gyur// mi bzod par mi 'gyur// thugs mi ches par mi 'gyur
362a5(mdo 'grel): te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bruru gzhag pa gnyis pa'o// la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan zhing bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog lo chos dang gnyer ba'i chos
362a6(mdo 'grel): la nan tan du byed/ la la rna ba btung de rim gror mi byed cing / bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhag par mi byed de/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos nan tan du mi byed kyang // des de bzhin gshegs pa
362b1(mdo 'grel): dgyes pa'am/ thugs khro bar mi 'gyur te/ thams cad dgongs pa ldan zhing mkhyen par btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs
362b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid gang zhe na/ gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir// sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus las mi mnga' ba ste/
362b3(mdo 'grel): de ni nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bge chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhe no/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ nyon mongs pa sbyangs kyang lus
362b4(mdo 'grel): kyi 'gyur ba yod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de lta bu yang mi mnga' ste/ de ni bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa zhes bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/ de bzhin ga
362b5(mdo 'grel): paba'i thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi brda nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir dus thams cad du 'jigs rten la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du rtog pa mdzad pa ces
362b6(mdo 'grel): bya ba ste/ dngos su na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems can mtha' yas pa yongasu smin par bya ba la gzigs pa rtag par 'byung ste/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen
363a1(mdo 'grel): po zhes bya 'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la khrul pa mi mnga'o// ca co myi mnga' 'o// dgo
363a2(mdo 'grel): bya nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// 'du shes sna tshogs minga' 'o// thugs mnyam pAr ma gzhug pa mi mnga' 'o// mra brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o// mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// brtson 'grus
363a3(mdo 'grel): yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// dran pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// ting nge 'dzin yongasu nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// shes rab yongasu nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba yongasu nyams pa mi mnga'o// /
363a4(mdo 'grel): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongasu nyams pa mi mnga'o// sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o// gsungs gi phrin las thams cad ye shes
363a5(mdo 'grel): kyi sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba'o// thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro ste/ ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba'o// 'angs pa'i dus lA ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs
363a6(mdo 'grel): pa la 'jug go/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa la 'jug go/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa la 'jug ste/ de dag ni
363b1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la dmigs pa med pa dran pas dbang sgyur ba zhi ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa mtshan nyid med
363b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// // bam po drug cu bdun pa// de la de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
363b3(mdo 'grel): gang zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang / phyag dang zha bas dra bas 'brel pa dang / phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin du mtho ba dang / sor mo
363b4(mdo 'grel): ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba dang / zhabs legs par mtho ba dang / yan lag gi s+tha gyen du 'khyil pa dang / ri dgas e Ne ya'i byin pa lta bu dang / phyug byaR+Sha drang por slebs pa dang / gsang
363b5(mdo 'grel): gnas sbubs su nub pa dang / gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'dzum pa dang / spu re re nas g.yas phyogasu 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang / seng ge'i ro stong lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes
363b6(mdo 'grel): par grub pa dang / phrag so shin du rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang / shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin du yangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / seng ge'i 'gram
364a1(mdo 'grel): pa lta bu dang / tshems shin tu dkar ba dang / tshems mnyam pa dang / tshems thag bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu
364a2(mdo 'grel): ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/ mu khyud can sde ba dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di lta ste/ rus pa 'am/ ba so la gzu
364a3(mdo 'grel): su brkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga' bas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o// zhabs kyi mthol gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog zhing zhabs zhum pa med pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa'o// ngang pa'i rgyal
364a4(mdo 'grel): ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel bas phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba'o// shing bral gyi sgo nga ltar shin du 'jam zhing gzhon pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o// phyag dang zhabs dang //
364a5(mdo 'grel): mgur gyi lhun shin tu mtho bas bdun shin tu mtho ba'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas sor mo ring pa'o// rting pa ring bas rting pa yungs pa'o// sku khru bdun du 'phags la drang bas sku che zhing drang ba'o// /
364a6(mdo 'grel): bupubus mo'i lha nga dang long bu ma dzes par nus pas zhabs legs par mtho ba'o// sku gyen du g.yas phyo gsuma'akhyil bas yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'o// ri dgas e Ne ya'i byin pa dang / smig ma da
364b1(mdo 'grel): ldum bu dar ba ltar drang zhing ma nyams la rims kyis gzhol bar grub cing byin pa zlum pas ri dgas e Ne'i byin pa lta bu'o// brla drang por bzhag ste ma btud kyang phyag gri mthil gnyis kyis pus
364b2(mdo 'grel): mo'i lha nga la reg pas phyag brla drang por sleb pa'o// glang po dang / rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin tu mdzes shing sbubs su nub pas gsang ba'i gnas sbubasu nub po'o// shin du sbyangs pa'i gser gyi
364b3(mdo 'grel): kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gyi khwa dog go/ gser dang dngul shin du sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing gzhon pa'i mdog tu 'dug la sku la rdul gyisi mi 'go bas
364b4(mdo 'grel): dog shin tu 'jame pa'o// rnam par phye ba'i spu rI reR+Sha skyes shing gnyis su med pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bya'o// me tog kun du dang zla ba dang 'o ma dang / ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la nyi ma dang
364b5(mdo 'grel): zla ba brgya las kyang 'phags par 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams shin tu brgyan pas zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa'o// ro stong che bas seng ge'i ro stong do// mgur dang rgyung legs par 'brel zhing lhun
364b6(mdo 'grel): zlus pa sa phrags pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'o// gser gyi gtan pa shin du phyis pa ltar phrag so legs par grub pas phrag so shin tu legs par rgyas pa'o// rlung dang mkhril pa dang bad kan gyi
365a1(mdo 'grel): ma nyams shing rnam par shes pa 'dra ba med pas ro bro ba'i mchog go/ sku chu zheng 'dom du mnyam pas shing n+ye gro d+ha ltar chu zhing gab pa'o// spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas phyogs
365a2(mdo 'grel): su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa'i du bu mnyam zhing legs par grub la mdzes pa mnga' bas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o// me tog ut+pa la dmar po'i 'dab ma'i mdog ltar 'dug cing shin tu yangs pas ljags
365a3(mdo 'grel): shin tu yangs shing srab pa'o// tshangs pa dang ka la bid+yA ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs so// 'gram me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mdzes par skyes te/ yid du 'di
365a4(mdo 'grel): bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o// me tog kun dadang dung gi gcig 'phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i tshems shin tu dkar ba'o// tshems la mthong sa na med pas tshems mnyam pa'o// tshems lo mtshams ma dong
365a5(mdo 'grel): pas tshems thags bzang ba'o// bla 'og dgye dgu med pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o// dkar nag gi cha ma 'dres la shin tu rnam par dag cing mdog dmar pos ma g.yos pas spyan dkar nag/
365a6(mdo 'grel): 'byed pa'o// rdzi ma bla 'og shin tu legs par gnas la ma 'dzings pas pa'i rdzi ma lta bu'o// de la bla ma la bsu skyel dang / chos nyan pa la bstod pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten la sogs pa'i
365b1(mdo 'grel): bsti stangs byas pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltaso// yid dam la brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste/ de ni mi g.yo zhing shin tu brtan pa'i snga ltaso//
365b2(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa dang / ngag snyan pa dang / don spyod pa dang / de na mthun pa'i bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi goms par byas pas/ phyag dang zha bas dra bas 'brel pa ste/ de ni myur du 'du ba'i snga ltas so// bza' ba dang bca' ba dang btung
365b3(mdo 'grel): bo zhim zhing nyams su bde ba byin pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba ste/ de gnyis ni bza' ba dang btung ba zhim zhing nyam su bde ba thob pa'i snga ltas so// bcings pa bkrol
365b4(mdo 'grel): ba dang / srog gi rim gro byas pa dang srog cod pa spangs pas/ sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang sku tsha zhing drang ba ste/ de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so// dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang bzung ba mngon
365b5(mdo 'grel): bar spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas zhabs kyi glong ma tho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba ste/ de ni mi nyams pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltaso// rig pa dang bzo'i las rim gror byas shing gzhan la byin
365b6(mdo 'grel): ba dang / bdag gis blangs pas ri dwags e Ne ya'i byin pa lta bu ste/ de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga bltas// bdog cing yod pa'i nor la bslangs na mi 'gong bar gtong zhing med ces ma byas pas phyag brla drang po'i
366a1(mdo 'grel): slobs pa ste/ de ni yo byad la dbang ba dang dul ba'i snga ltas so// 'grog pa dang mdza' bshes gnyen pa ma phye ba dang / bye bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa
366a2(mdo 'grel): lnga yang dag par bsgral ba dang / gAs ba'i tshi go yongs su bsrung bsdu gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste/ de ni bu mang ba'i snga lta so// stan+yo dang gros dang khang pa dang gzhal med khang dang / gnas
366a3(mdo 'grel): byin pas gser gyi kha dog dang mdog shin tu 'jam pa ste/ de gnyis ni gdan dang na bza' dang / khang pa dang gzhal med khang dang gnas bzang po 'thob pa'i sna ltaso// 'du 'ji spangs pa dang / mkhan po/
366a4(mdo 'grel): dong / slob dpon dang / pha ma dang po nu la stegs pa bla mra rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rimu gror byas pa dang / btsun par byas pa dang / bsgo ba rna la ma gzan pa saM s+phu ra re nas g.yas phyogs 'khyil
366a5(mdo 'grel): ba dang zhal 'dzod spus brgyan pa ste/ de ni mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so// mi snyan pa mi zer zhing mi smod la snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad pa mthun par 'dzin pas seng ge'i ro stong lta bu dang /
366a6(mdo 'grel): phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste/ de ni thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so// na ba rnams la rtsi ba dang rimi 'gro dang sman dang nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang / rim gror byas pas phrag so shin tu
366b1(mdo 'grel): rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog ste/ de ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltaso// skyed mos tshul dang / 'khor dang ltung ba dang / rdzing bu dang / brgya la dka' ba'i zam pa dang kha zla dang / phreng ba'i gnas dang / stegs dang
366b2(mdo 'grel): gtsug lag khang bya ba la sogs pa la gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing bdag gis gzhan la byin pas shing n+ya gro d+hA ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/ da ni mnga'
366b3(mdo 'grel): chen po mnga' ba'i snga lta so// yun ring por tshig bstan zhing 'dzom pa dang nyams su bde bas smras pas lkugs shin du yangs shing srab pa dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/ de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang
366b4(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltaso// gsung yan lag lha dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ yongs su shes shing rnam phar shes par gyur pa dang / mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang / zab cing
366b5(mdo 'grel): dbyangs rjesu 'byung ba dang / betang mI bra zh-ing rnar snyan pa dang / me 'khrugs shring gsal bya'o// yun ring po nas tshig 'khyalnga pa spangs shing dus su smra smra bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/ de ni tshig
366b6(mdo 'grel): kun gyis sbyin pa'i snga bltas so// rim gror bya ba dang brnyas pa med pa gnyis kyis 'tsho ba yongasu dag pas tshems shin tu dkar ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i lnga ltaso//
367a1(mdo 'grel): yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma med pa'i tshig sgra sgru bas tshems thugs bzang ba dang / tshems mnya zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ste/ de ni 'khor dbyer mi phye ba'i snga ltas so// dbang gis khyud/
367a2(mdo 'grel): bya bzhin du nyes pararu bsams pa med pa la ma tshugs shing mi ldang ba dang / rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta lta bas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so// /
367a3(mdo 'grel): rashor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbye byad bzang po brgyad bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
367a4(mdo 'grel): ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dbyen pa ste/ sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen gshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan pa
367a5(mdo 'grel): dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sen mo mdog snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs dang rgyud mthon por byung ba ste/ senu mo mtho ba yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/
367a6(mdo 'grel): tshul kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba ste/ sor mo zla ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshogs pa ste/ sor mo rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba
367b1(mdo 'grel): rim gyis grub pa ste/ sor mo rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang gsung dang sku'i phrin las dang 'tsho ba shin tu dbyen pa ste/ rtsa mi mngon pa yin/ t+ya wa~M lngam rgyan po rje gco
367b2(mdo 'grel): med pa yi/ \u0f7fni shin tu dben pa'i chos mda' ba ste/ ljongs bu mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mi many+dzamA pa thams cad las sgrol ba ste/ zhabs mnyam pa med pa yin// sangs
367b3(mdo 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i seng ge ste/ seng ge'i 'gros su gzhung ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i glang po ste/ glang po che'i gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
367b4(mdo 'grel): 'das ni ngang ba'i rgyal po ltar na mkha' la bzhud pa ste/ ngang pa'i stabasu bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i khyud mchog ste/ khyu mchog gi stabasu bzhud pa yin// sangs rgyas bcis
367b5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das rnams ni mthun pa'i lam mnga' bya ste/ g.yas phyogs gzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dren ni blta na mdzes pa ste/ mdzes par gzhung pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
367b6(mdo 'grel): ni rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste/ ma yo bar bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste/ sku shin tu legs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
368a1(mdo 'grel): 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad rnam ni chos rim gyis ston pa ste/ sku rim gyis gzhol
368a2(mdo 'grel): ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku dang gsung dang thugs gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam pa'i thugs dang ldan
368a3(mdo 'grel): bapa ste/ sku shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dge ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ shin du rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang
368a4(mdo 'grel): 'dul ba shin du rdzog pa ste/ dpe byed shin tu rdzogs pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni yon tan yangs shing bzang po ston pa ste/ sku che zhing mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
368a5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku legs par mnyam pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin du 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste/ sku shin tu
368a6(mdo 'grel): gzhon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku zhum pa med pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste/
368b1(mdo 'grel): sku shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/ sku shin tu mkhregs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i
368b2(mdo 'grel): yan lagra dang nying lag legs par ston pa ste/ yan lag dang nying lag sba bar mdzes pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu dag pa ste/ snang ba rab rib med cing rnam par
368b3(mdo 'grel): dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ phyal zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa
368b4(mdo 'grel): ste/ phyal shin tu byang ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom pa ste/ phyal ma zhom pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zad pa rnam par bzlog
368b5(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ phyal phyam mer 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zab mo shin du thugs su chud pa ste/ lte ba zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
368b6(mdo 'grel): mthun par 'dzin po'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ lte ba g.yos phyogs su 'khyil pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad nas ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste/ kun nas mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas
369a1(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin tu gtsang ba dang ldan pa ste/ kun du spyod pa shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i
369a2(mdo 'grel): chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/ sku la smi ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shing ba la ltar rab tu yang ba rab tu 'thob pa'i chos ston pa ste/ phyag shing bal ltar 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas
369a3(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi skye bo dang skye bo phal la byams pas dge sbyong chen po mnyes pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pa ste/
369a4(mdo 'grel): phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang mi
369a5(mdo 'grel): ring byar 'cha' ba ste/ zhal ha cang mi ring yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs brnyan 'jig rten du skye ba ste/ zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin/ sang+yas bac+doMs rnams ni 'jam
369a6(mdo 'grel): pabasngon du btang zhing 'dul ba ste/ ljags shin du 'jam pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan phra ba'i tsho gas dang ldan pa ste/ ljags shin du srab pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
369b1(mdo 'grel): rnams ni byis pa so so'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyis chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag par dka' ba ste/ ljags shin tu dmar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po'i sgra dang 'brug
369b2(mdo 'grel): gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba ste/ glang po'i nga ro dang / 'brug gi sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa yin// sad+yas bac+doMs rnams ni snyan zhing 'jam pa dang / nyam su bde bar sme ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ snyan zhing 'ja
369b3(mdo 'grel): pa dang nyam su bde ba dang ldan pa'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid par kun du sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/ tshems shin tu mche ba zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
369b4(mdo 'grel): 'das rnams ni skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/ tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ches dang 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu dkar ba yin/
369b5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/ tshems che ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i
369b6(mdo 'grel): chos ston pa ste/ tshems mche ba rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi ri bo mthun po la bzhugs pa ste/ shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin// sa/
370a1(mdo 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ba mnga' ste/ shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs pa
370a2(mdo 'grel): mnga' ba ste/ spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin du rnam par dag pa ste/ spyan rnams par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi
370a3(mdo 'grel): tshogs shin tu bsags pa ste/ rdzi ma stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lha dang lha ma yin dang skyes bu na chung mchog mig dkar nag 'byes shing pad+mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon
370a4(mdo 'grel): par dga' bar byas pa ste/ spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu yangs par gzigs pa ste/ smin ma ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs
370a5(mdo 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam par 'dul ba la mkha pa ste/ smin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ smin ma'i spu mnyam pa
370a6(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa yin pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems can snum par 'gyur ba'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/ smin ma sdum pa dang ldan pa yin// sangs rgyas
370b1(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan mnga' ba ste/ snyan shal legs shing snyan shal ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las
370b2(mdo 'grel): rnam par rgyal ba ste/ snyan ma nyams pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can bsam pa ma nyam pa 'dul ba ste/ snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
370b3(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das rnams ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su sbyangs pa ste/ zhel 'phrul bas legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phas kyi rgol ba shin tu 'dul ba ste/
370b4(mdo 'grel): zhal 'phral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam dam pa shin du rdzogs pa ste/ dbu shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi bung
370b5(mdo 'grel): ba rnam par bzlog pa ste/ dbu sgre bung ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin// sangs rgyus bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ba dang sgom pas spang ba'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/ dbu skra stug pa yin// /
370b6(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugasu chud pa ste/ dbu skra 'jam pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa
371a1(mdo 'grel): ste/ dbu skra mi 'dzings pa dang ldan pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni brlang ba'i gsung dang yongasu bral ba ste/ dbu skra mi rtsub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
371a2(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyis me tog gis skye bo mthun par bsgrubs pa ste/ dbu skra dri zhim pa ya na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang /
371a3(mdo 'grel): bak+Sha shrIs dang / g.yung drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa yin te/ rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o// rab 'byor de lta
371a4(mdo 'grel): bu'i chos kyi rnam pa de dag gzhan la bshud pa dang / bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
371a5(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo cher smad du byung ba'i choso// /
371a6(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu
371b1(mdo 'grel): phyin pa drug gis sems can rnams sdung pa yin te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
371b2(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par smra bar sems
371b3(mdo 'grel): can rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig
371b4(mdo 'grel): snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
371b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/
371b6(mdo 'grel): 'byor 'di ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams
372a1(mdo 'grel): sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir
372a2(mdo 'grel): zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can sdud do// rab 'byor de
372a3(mdo 'grel): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la 'god pa'i phrin las yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
372a4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad du 'doms shing 'di skad du ston te/ rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog yi ge
372a5(mdo 'grel): mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis nas yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig gri byang ba'i rang bzhin thams
372a6(mdo 'grel): cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge bzhin bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig tu
372b1(mdo 'grel): so ga bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par bsgoms shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par snyoms shig ces chos ston to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang mi gas /
372b2(mdo 'grel): la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas pa yin// yi ge gcig nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin// yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyisu yi ge gcig 'dus par
372b3(mdo 'grel): bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin te/ chos la mkhas pa yin te/ de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya na/ lam la goms shing yi ge med par mngon par bsgrub pa lA mkhas pa
372b4(mdo 'grel): yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos la mkhas pa dang yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/ chos la mkhas pa dang yi ge la mkha
372b5(mdo 'grel): pas yi ge mang pos yi ge myod pa'i chos ston kyang / rab 'byor chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang bral bu yang ma yin te/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar cha
372b6(mdo 'grel): byung ba'i chos te/ gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad thun mongs ma yin pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te/
373a1(mdo 'grel): mtha' las 'das pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ sems can yang shin tu mi dmigs/ chos kyang mi dmigs/ chos kyi dngos po yang mi dmigs pa la
373a2(mdo 'grel): nabacom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
373a3(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / byang chub
373a4(mdo 'grel): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pI ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la skyed pa dang /
373a5(mdo 'grel): mthor gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs
373a6(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / skye bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod cing / rnam par smin pa las thung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gan nI sems can rnams
373b1(mdo 'grel): la chos ston par 'gyur/ de la ni sems can mi dmigs te/ sems can du gdugs pa'ang mi dmigs so// sems can ma dmigs pas gzugs dmigs su ma mchis// sems can mi dmigs pas
373b2(mdo 'grel): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam dang / rnam par shes pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi
373b3(mdo 'grel): dmigs pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs ma mchis// sems can mi dmigs pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dmi su ma mchis so// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dmigs
373b4(mdo 'grel): ma mchis so// sems can dmigs su ma mchis pa lnga ni sems can ma mchis so// gzugs ma mchis// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// sangs
373b5(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi chos mu 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi byar du ma mchiso// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma mchis so// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ma mchis so// dpe byad bzang po brgyad
373b6(mdo 'grel): cu ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang
374a1(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dmigs par 'gyur ba lta gA la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhi no// de bzhin te/
374a2(mdo 'grel): ji skad du smra ba bzhin no// rab 'byor de ltar na sems can mi dmigs pas nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// phyi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
374a3(mdo 'grel): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rig par bya'o// phung po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// khams stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// skye mched stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar stong pa
374a4(mdo 'grel): nyid du rig par bya'o// bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sems can stong po nyid du rlig par bya'o// srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang skyes bu dang
374a5(mdo 'grel): gang zag dang / shod can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / slong ba po dang / kun nis slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa po dang / shes pa po dang /
374a6(mdo 'grel): mthong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// yang dag par spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yin
374b1(mdo 'grel): lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang // bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
374b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jog pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
374b3(mdo 'grel): dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / khyod rje chen po dag sa kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i
374b4(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid dang / rnam
374b5(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du rig par
374b6(mdo 'grel): bya'o// rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// chos de dag thams cad stong par mthong nas/ phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems ca
375a1(mdo 'grel): rnams la chos ston te/ ji ltar stong pa nyid de dag la yang mi 'jug pa de ltar ston to// des de ltar mthong nas chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes te/ chos gang la yang
375a2(mdo 'grel): 'khrug par mi byed gnyisu mi byed de/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang ston par byed// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni sprul pa bye ba phrag du mar sprul zhing sems can
375a3(mdo 'grel): la la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la tshul khrim kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la bzod pa'ipha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la brtson 'grus gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la
375a4(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga sbyor/ la la bsam gtan bzhi la/ lo la tshwa med pa dang la lagang+gA sde pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la byang
375a5(mdo 'grel): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la sbyor/ la la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / la la rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / le la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / lnga la
375a6(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / la la mngon par shes pa lnga la sbyor// la la ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / la la gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sbyor/ la la de bzhin
375b1(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / la la mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / la la so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / la la byams pa chen po dang / la la snying rje chen po dang / la la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
375b2(mdo 'grel): pa bco brgyad la sbyor/ la la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor/ la la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / la la phyir mi 'ong ba'i bras bu dgal la dgra bcom nyid dang / la la rang byang chub la sbyor
375b3(mdo 'grel): la la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la sbyor na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa des chos la la zhig tha da du phye ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// /
375b4(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ semasde can rnams la chos ston te/
375b5(mdo 'grel): de dag phyin ci log rnams las yongasu bkrol nas ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshul du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'god do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ma bcings
375b6(mdo 'grel): ma grol ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ gzugs
376a1(mdo 'grel): kyi ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin
376a2(mdo 'grel): pa de/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
376a3(mdo 'grel): ltar gzugs ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin du rnam par dag pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni shin du
376a4(mdo 'grel): rnam par dag pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston kyang sems can du
