466b6(mdo 'grel): sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig/
467a1(mdo 'grel): phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan
467a2(mdo 'grel): yang bde bcu gyis shig/ phongs pas zil gyis non zhing nyid sha nying gis zos te/ ngan srong gsum las mi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la
467a3(mdo 'grel): 'di skad du chos ston to// skyes bu dag tshul khrims dran pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims dran pas ni bdag gi don yang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par
467a4(mdo 'grel): smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas srem/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/ bdag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/
467a5(mdo 'grel): de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'gro' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa de dag la 'di skad du
467a6(mdo 'grel): chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs
467b1(mdo 'grel): par gyur na sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yin gyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs
467b2(mdo 'grel): yang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag lo 'di skad du chos ston to// kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdug gi/
467b3(mdo 'grel): don kyang bya bor mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lho'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum
467b4(mdo 'grel): tu ltung no// bdag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston
467b5(mdo 'grel): to// sems can gang sems g.yeng ba de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yong ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am
467b6(mdo 'grel): byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te / de ltar khyod ngan song gsum du ltung na bdag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyod kyis g.yeng
468a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal pa/ gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston
468a2(mdo 'grel): te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'cha' bas ni bdag gi don yang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ gang shes rab 'cha'u ba'i rnam par smin pa ni
468a3(mdo 'grel): sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga'i tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du
468a4(mdo 'grel): gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad na mi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can ji snyed pa de dag gi thams cad ni byams po la sbyor ro// gti mug gi/
468a5(mdo 'grel): spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag thatha ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba lnga sbyor ro// las ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni yang dag pa'i lum la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lom mam/ rang sangs
468a6(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi lam mam/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyi stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams
468b1(mdo 'grel): ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par
468b2(mdo 'grel): shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// de lha'i mgri rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / 'o ga dang /
468b3(mdo 'grel): steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bram/
468b4(mdo 'grel): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i
468b5(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
468b6(mdo 'grel): stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang
469a1(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad
469a2(mdo 'grel): du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig/ phongs pa ni sdug bsngal po ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don yang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis de ltar khyod kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag kyang bde bar gyis shig/
469a3(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang bde bor gyis shig/ phongs pas zil gyis non zhing nyid shra nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las mi thar par gyur ta ro zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa
469a4(mdo 'grel): de dag lnga 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu drug tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngalnga ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par
469a5(mdo 'grel): smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byo la song gi skye gnas sam/ gshini rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung no bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/
469a6(mdo 'grel): de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag
469b1(mdo 'grel): la 'di skad du chos ston to// de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos grang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs
469b2(mdo 'grel): par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye bo 'amya/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yin gyi sa/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs
469b3(mdo 'grel): kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur tA re zhes chos ston to// sems tson le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag lu 'i di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gdon kyang bya
469b4(mdo 'grel): bar mi nus nA gzhon gyi don lta ci smos te/ lce lo'i rnam pa r-I smin+da pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol sdong gi skye gan sam+b+ha/ gashrI na rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyod dran srong gsum du ltang na bdag kyang
469b5(mdo 'grel): gdon par mi nus na gzhan gidon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur tA re zhes chos ston to// sems can sems
469b6(mdo 'grel): g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems can g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yong ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye
470a1(mdo 'grel): gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir g.yeng ba'i
470a2(mdo 'grel): sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyed pa can du gyur tA ro zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'tshul pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te// kye skyes bu dag
470a3(mdo 'grel): shes rab 'chal ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'tshal bas nI bdag gi don yang byA bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyis don lta ci smos te/ gang shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal
470a4(mdo 'grel): ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ da ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga'i tsam gyi go skabs kyang gA skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa con
470a5(mdo 'grel): du gyur ta ro zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa tsun gang ji snyed pa de dag ni mi sdug pa lnga sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can+da gang ji snyed pa de dag ni byams pA la sbyor ro// gauti mug gi spyod pa
470a6(mdo 'grel): can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung po la sbyor ro// lami ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag ni yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam mam/ rang sangs rgyas
470b1(mdo 'grel): kyi lam mamu/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyi stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos
470b2(mdo 'grel): rnams ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa myed do zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
470b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni mngon par shes pa rnams la mi gnas par
470b4(mdo 'grel): sems can rnams lnga chos bstan par mi nus te/ lam gol bar zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam du gzung bar mi nus so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bya 'dab ma med pa ni nam
470b5(mdo 'grel): mkha' la 'gro bar mi nus so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la ma brten par sems can rnams la chos bstan par mi
470b6(mdo 'grel): nus so// rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/ de
471a1(mdo 'grel): mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrubs pa de dag gi sems can rnams kyi don ji ltar bya bar dga' ba de bde bar byed do// de lha'i mig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
471a2(mdo 'grel): gang gA'i klung gi bya ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can ga nga ji snyed cig kyang skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis
471a3(mdo 'grel): khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun pa'i sbyin pa'i gratam mamra/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi gtam ma ma/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/
471a4(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar chos ston to// des lha'i mig gi lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gri phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
471a5(mdo 'grel): grang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gi sems sems
471a6(mdo 'grel): kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan nam/ shes rab kyi gtam mam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i
471b1(mdo 'grel): gtam ma ma/ 'byung ba'i gutam gyi bar du chos ston to// dus lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis 'di lta ste/ lha dang mi gnyis ka'i sgra yang thos te/ de shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye
471b2(mdo 'grel): ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems
471b3(mdo 'grel): can rnams la chos ston to// sbyin pa'i gtam mam/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi gtam mam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam
471b4(mdo 'grel): mam/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston te/ de'i lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'ogra dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
471b5(mdo 'grel): ga gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de drug gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de
471b6(mdo 'grel): bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te// sbyin pa'i gtam mam/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi gtam mam/ 'phags pa'i
472a1(mdo 'grel): bden pa'i gtam mam/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de sems kyi rnam grangs shes
472a2(mdo 'grel): pa des sems can rnams kyi sems shes par byas shing de dag la de bzhin nyid du chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam mam/ tshul khrims drang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang /
472a3(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi gtam mam/ 'phags pa'i bladen pa'i gtam mam// 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du cho snga ston to// de bdag gam gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/ sngon gyis gnas
472a4(mdo 'grel): rjes su dran pa'i shes pa des sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan 'di zhes bya ba nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byung ngo zhes bya bar yang shes
472a5(mdo 'grel): te/ sems can sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa la mos pa/ gang ji snyed pa de dag la yang dag pa nyid du chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam mom// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bas gtotan dang shes ra
472a6(mdo 'grel): kyi gtam mam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de rdzu 'phrul gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing
472b1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed de/ bsnyen bkur byas nas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis sems can rnams la chos ston to// sbyin pa'i gtam mam// tshul khrims dang /
472b2(mdo 'grel): bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi gtam mim/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de zag pa med pa mngon du bya ba'i
472b3(mdo 'grel): shes pa shin du rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de zag pa med pa mngon du bya ba'i shes pa shin du rig pa des sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam mam/ tshul khrims dang /
472b4(mdo 'grel): bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsem gA tan dang / shes rab kyi gta mu ma ma/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/ 'byung ba'i gtamya gyi bar du chos ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
472b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/ de mngon par shes pa shin du 'dres pa de dag gis lus ci dang
472b6(mdo 'grel): ci lta bu bzung bar 'dod pa de dang de lta bu'i lus yongs su bzung zhing / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba de dag gis gos par mi 'gyur ro// rab
473a1(mdo 'grel): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i skyes bu ni dgos pa thams cad byed kyang badre ba 'am/ sdug bsngal des gos par 'gyur ba med do// rab 'byor de bzhin
473a2(mdo 'grel): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse zhing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mos
473a3(mdo 'grel): pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan kyang bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba des 'phrog par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar
473a4(mdo 'grel): mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse bar byas te/ ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyuraro ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de ltar brtse bar bya ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
473a5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen pos ni sangasA rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par mo byas sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par ma byas par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
473a6(mdo 'grel): byar mi nus so// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam gyi yan lag dang mi ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub med do zhes bya ba ni sangs
473b1(mdo 'grel): rgyas rnams kyi drung du nye bar 'gro bya dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba la sogs pa la dgod pa'i phrin las yin no// // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
473b2(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po lam gyi yan lag rdzogs par bgyis shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam de dag gang logs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
473b3(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dge ba'i chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam gyi yan lag go// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lam gyi yan lag gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par
473b4(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bu'i lAm+ba gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos de dag gang lags// bam po bdun cu gsum pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis
473b5(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal bya// sems drang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing de yongs su gtong ba'i tshe ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni sbyin pa'o// 'dri la
473b6(mdo 'grel): btang bar bya'o// bdag gis sbyin par bya'o zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog po ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i
474a1(mdo 'grel): chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtso 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
474a2(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing shes rab sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni shes rab bo// bdag gis shes rab sgom mo//
474a3(mdo 'grel): 'di'i don du shes rab sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba la sgrol zhing gzhan yung sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//
474a4(mdo 'grel): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i chos stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa
474a5(mdo 'grel): bzhi dang / bsamo gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
474a6(mdo 'grel): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
474b1(mdo 'grel): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod kyang de la myi rtag cing sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
474b2(mdo 'grel): brgyad sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du sangs rgyas kyi chos
474b3(mdo 'grel): ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sbrel zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos
474b4(mdo 'grel): so// rab 'byor dge ba'i chos de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ste/ lam nges 'das pa dang / da ltar gyi byang chub sems
474b5(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can tshad med pa rnams dang de 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho lus brgal bar gyur pa dang / brgal ba dang / brgal bar 'gyur ba ste/ lam de yongs su rdzogs par byas shing
474b6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
475a1(mdo 'grel): te/ sems can rnams kyi don byed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag byang chub sem
475a2(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos lags na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang 'di skad du gal te chos de dag byang chub sems dpa' chos yin/
475a3(mdo 'grel): nasangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang chos de dag nyid rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar zung de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
475a4(mdo 'grel): nus bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yongs su spong ngo // de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par
475a5(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas byas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
475a6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po dang // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khyad par de yod do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na zhugs pa yang gzhan la/ 'bras bu la gnas pa'ang
475b1(mdo 'grel): gzhan te/ de gnyis ka yang 'phags pa'i gang zag ma yin zhes mi bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bar chad med pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs
475b2(mdo 'grel): pa dgra/ bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
475b3(mdo 'grel): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyad par ro// zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag la 'god pa'i phrin las yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang gi
475b4(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos de dag la 'di ni sems can dmyal ba pa'i// 'di ni byolnga song gi skye gnas pa'o// 'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o// 'di ni lha'o// 'di ni
475b5(mdo 'grel): mi'o// 'di ni rigs kyi sra'o// 'di ni brgyad pa'o// 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub
475b6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yid dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar khyad par dang rnam par dbye bar ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang zag de dag dmigs
476a1(mdo 'grel): su ma mchis pa de bzhin du lus kyang dmigs su ma mchis/ las ji ltar dmigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa yang dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan
476a2(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mi dmigs so//
476a3(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor glang gis ring gis mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad de ltar mi shes pa de dag ni ngan par spyad pa 'am/ legs par spyad pa 'am/ mi g.yo ba'i las mngon par 'du byed de/ de drug ngan
476a4(mdo 'grel): par spyad pa'i las kyis ngan song gsum du ltung ngo // legs par spyad pa'i las kyi lha dang mir skye'o// nyams pa med pa'i las kyis gzu gas kyi khams sama?/ gzugs med pa'i khrims su skye'o// de la
476a5(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
476a6(mdo 'grel): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ nang stong pa nyid la spyad/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyad/ dran pa nye bar ga zhag pa rnams lo spyad/ yang dag par
476b1(mdo 'grel): spong ba rnams spyad/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
476b2(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam paro thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
476b3(mdo 'grel): pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje
476b4(mdo 'grel): chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyad de/ nyams pa med pa'i spyod pas byang chub kyi lam bskyed nas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi yan lag gi 'khor dang ldan pa la mnyam par
476b5(mdo 'grel): gzhag cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ don byas nas ci nas kyang phyis chung
476b6(mdo 'grel): zos shing rgyud lnga'i 'khor bar mi lhung ba de ltar don byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
477a1(mdo 'grel): nas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba gzigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ma yin no// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos nag po 'am/
477a2(mdo 'grel): dkar po 'am/ gu nag pa 'ami/ dkar ba 'am/ mi gnag mI dkar bar dmigs lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste ma dmigs na/ sems can
477a3(mdo 'grel): dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ji ltar gdags par mdzad/ lha dang mir ji ltar gdags par mdzad/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba
477a4(mdo 'grel): dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags par mdzad/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags par
477a5(mdo 'grel): mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci sems can 'di drag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes sam/ gsol pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
477a6(mdo 'grel): ba/ rab 'byor gal te sems can de dge 'di ltar chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
477b1(mdo 'grel): byang chub tu ma 'jug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs na sems can rnams kyang dran song gsum dang / 'khor ba'i rgyud rnams las mi 'grol ste/ rab 'byor sems can
477b2(mdo 'grel): de dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par mi shes la mi shes pas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su mi 'grol bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sangs rgyas bcom
477b3(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das de dag las chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par mthong nas/ sems can rnams kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug ste/ chos 'di dag ni ji ltar byis pa so/
477b4(mdo 'grel): so'i skye bo rnams kyis mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu yod pa ma yin na/ de dag ni med cing yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yod par brtags shing sems can med pa la sems can du 'du shes/
477b5(mdo 'grel): gzugs med pa la gzugs su 'du shes pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes/ skye mched rnams med pa la skye mched du 'du shes/ kham
477b6(mdo 'grel): rnams med pa la khams su 'du shes rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba med pa la rten cing 'brel par 'du shes/ 'jig rten pa'i chos la 'jig rten pa'i chos su 'du shes/ 'jig rten los 'das pa'i chos la 'jig
478a1(mdo 'grel): rten las 'das pa'i chos su 'du shes/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos su 'du shes/ zag pa med pa'i chos la zug pa med pa'i chos su 'du shes/ 'du
478a2(mdo 'grel): byas kyi chos la 'du byas kyi chos su 'du shes/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos la 'dus ma byas kyi chos su 'du shes nas/ yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams/
478a3(mdo 'grel): lus dang dug dang yid kyi las mngon par 'du byed pa de dag rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su mi 'grol ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par
478a4(mdo 'grel): dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus par byas te/ byang chub sems dpe'i spyad pa spyod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par
478a5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas nas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongs su 'grol to// zhes bya ba ni las dang 'bras bur 'grel pa chu de mi za ba la dgod pa'i phrin las yin no// /
478a6(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
478b1(mdo 'grel): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongs su 'grel pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
478b2(mdo 'grel): chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro/
478b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i lam sems can rnams la ston to// 'chang ngo // 'jog go/ 'god do// 'grel to// rnam par 'byed do// gsal bar byed do// yang dag par brjod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'dir dge ba'i chos
478b4(mdo 'grel): byang chub kyi phyogs gang ji snyed pa gang gi dkon mchog gsum rnam par dgod pa de dag thams cad yongs su 'dus tau/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon
478b5(mdo 'grel): mchog gsum 'jig rten du byung bas sems can rnams lam rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su 'grel to// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'tshal ba yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
478b6(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te sdug bsngal gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ kun 'byung ba 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te kun 'byung bas mya ngan los 'da' bar
479a1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te sdug bsngal 'gog pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ lam 'tshal nas yongs
479a2(mdo 'grel): su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te lam gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sdug bsngal shes pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ sdug
479a3(mdo 'grel): bsngal gyis kyang ma yin no// kun 'byung ba shes pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ kun 'byung bas kyang ma yin no// sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pas yongs su mya dran las mi 'da' ste/ sdug bsngal 'gog
479a4(mdo 'grel): pas kyang ma yin no// lam shes pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ lam gyis kyang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das par ngas gsungs
479a5(mdo 'grel): te/ sdug bsngal shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ sdug bsngal gyis kyang ma yin no// kun 'byung ba shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ kun 'byung bas kyang ma yin no// sdug
479a6(mdo 'grel): bsngal 'a gog pa shes pas yong su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma yin no// lam shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ lam gyis kyang ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom
479b1(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das gang la sdug bsngal ba yang ma mchis/ sdug bsngal 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/ kun 'byung ba yang ma mchis/ kun 'byung ba 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/ 'gog pa yang ma mchis/ 'gog pa 'tshal ba yung ma
479b2(mdo 'grel): mchis/ lam yang ma mchis/ lam 'tshal ba yang ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de
479b3(mdo 'grel): dag gi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'
479b4(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ de bzhin du gnas pa'i dbyings dang / chos kyi dbyings mi 'phel mi 'grib par 'dug pu ste/ de'i phyir byang chub
479b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bden pa khyod du chud pa ji lta ba bzhin du bden pa khong du chud par bya ba'i don du spyod do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
479b6(mdo 'grel): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na bden pa rtogs pa'i don du spyod pa lags/ ji ltar spyod na bden pa rtogs shing 'tshal te khong du chud nas nyen
480a1(mdo 'grel): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
480a2(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag ci nas kyang chos gang yang dmigs su med pa de ltar mthong ste/ chos thams cad ma dmigs pas bden par gtogs pa 'am/
480a3(mdo 'grel): bden par ma gtogs pa'i chos thams cad stong par mthong ste/ des de ltar mthong bas skyon med par chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi sa la
480a4(mdo 'grel): gnas pa de spyi bor ltung ba gang gis nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ba spyi bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de rigs kyis de la gnas shing bsam gtan bzhi
480a5(mdo 'grel): sgrub po// tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgrub po// de lhag mthong gis de la gnas shing chos thams cad rab tu shes par byed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud
480a6(mdo 'grel): par byed de/ de sdug bsngal yongs su shes kyang sdug bsngal la dmigs pa'i sems mi bskyed do// kun 'byung ba rab tu spangs kyang kun 'byung ba la dmigs pa'i sems mi bskyed do// 'gog pa mngon du bying
480b1(mdo 'grel): kyang 'gog pa la dmigs pa'i sems mi bskyed de/ lam sgom yang lam la dmigs pa'i sems mi bskyed do// gzhan du byang chub la gzhol ba'i sems kyis chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar
480b2(mdo 'grel): byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin zhes bgyi ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid do// gaskol ba/ stong pa gang lags/ bcom
480b3(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de/ rnam pa de lta bu'i lhag mthong gis chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar lta ste/ ngo bo nyid gang la gnas shing byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
480b4(mdo 'grel): rgyu ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid chos gang la yang ngo bo nyid yod par mi mthong ngo // dngos po med pa ni byang chub ste/ de ni sangs rgyas kyis ma mdzad/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/ dgra bcom pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / lan
480b5(mdo 'grel): cig phyir ma 'ong ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pas ma byas/ de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma byas/ gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma byas ste/ gzhan du na yang dag
480b6(mdo 'grel): pa ji lta ba de sems can rnams kyis ma shes ma mthong bas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston to zhes bya
481a1(mdo 'grel): ba ni bden pa mthong ba la dgod pa'i phrin las yin no// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
481a2(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i slob pa
481a3(mdo 'grel): le slob par 'tshal bas gzugs la ji ltar slob par bgyi/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ mig gi skye mched dang // rna ba'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched
481a4(mdo 'grel): dang / lce'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ gzugs kyi skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched dang / chos kyi sku
481a5(mdo 'grel): mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams
481a6(mdo 'grel): dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
481b1(mdo 'grel): dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i skye mched dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg
481b2(mdo 'grel): ba'i skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang
481b3(mdo 'grel): rga shi la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang / kun 'byung gi bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lom gyi bden pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ gzugs can gyi chos rnams dang / gzugs
481b4(mdo 'grel): can ma lags pa dang / bstan du mchi pa rnams dang / bstan du ma mchis pa rnams dang / thogs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa rnams dang / 'dus bgyi ba rnams dang / 'dus ma bgyis pa
481b5(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / zag pa ma mchis pa rnams dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa rnams dang / kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa rnams dang / dman pa rnams dang / gya nom pa rnams dang / nang gi
481b6(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid rnams dang / phyi'i bdag nyid rnams dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnams dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma
482a1(mdo 'grel): bstan pa rnams dang / 'dod pa dang / rab tu ldan pa rnams dang / gzugs dang rab tu ldan pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa dang rab tu ldan pa rnams dang / slob pa rnams dang / mi slob pa
482a2(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / slob pa yang ma lags mi slob pa yang ma lags pa rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ 'dod chags dang / khong khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / ma rig pa dang / lta ba dang / the tshim la ji ltar bslab par bgyi
482a3(mdo 'grel): ser sna dang / sbyin pa dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims dang / gnod sems dang / bzod pa dang / le lo dang / brtson 'grus dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / bsam gtan dang / 'chal pa'i shes
482a4(mdo 'grel): rab dang / shes rab la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ rnam par rtog pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / log pa'i smon lam dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi
482a5(mdo 'grel): sdug pa'i chos rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang / nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byeng ba dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dang / sangs rgyas
482a6(mdo 'grel): kyi chos rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams po 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa byang chub sems
482b1(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa lnga slob par 'dod pas gzugs ming tsam mo zhes bya bar bslab par bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
482b2(mdo 'grel): rnams drang / rnam par shes pa ming tsam mo zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du ming tsam mo zhes bya bar bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams
482b3(mdo 'grel): pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe 'di ni gzugs so 'di ni ming ngo zhes dngos po dang bcas par dmi gros/ gang gi tshe 'di ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
482b4(mdo 'grel): shes pa'o// 'di ni ming ngo zhes dngos po dang bcas par dmigs/ gang gi tshe 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar ro// 'di ni ming ngo zhes 'du byed kyi mtshan ma nye bar gzung ste dngos po dang bcas par dmyigs
482b5(mdo 'grel): pa de'i tshe ji ltar byang chub sems dpas gzugs ming tsam zhes bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ming tsam zhes bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
482b6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi bar du ming tsam zhes bgyi bar bslab par bgyi/ gal te dngos po ma mchis pa lags na de'i ming de yang ming tsam kho na zhes bgyi bar mi rung lags te/ gzugs zhes bgyi ba gang lags
483a1(mdo 'grel): pa de ni ming tsam kho na zhes bgyi bar mi rung lags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi
483a2(mdo 'grel): ba gang lags pa 'di yang rnying tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lugs so// de skad ces gsel ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzugs zhes bgyi ba
483a3(mdo 'grel): gang yin pa 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang der glo bur du ming du btags pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shis dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'dri ni glo bur du ming du
483a4(mdo 'grel): btags pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar gang yin pa 'di yang glo bur du ming du bdags pa'o// byams pa gang las 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po des gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming der gzugs
483a5(mdo 'grel): zhes bya bar yang dag par rtogs pa dang / rab tu rtogs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig par 'gyur te/ byams pa rnam grangs des na gzugs shes bya ba gang yin pa 'di dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
483a6(mdo 'grel): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang der glo bur du ming du btags pa yin par
483b1(mdo 'grel): de ltar reg par bya'o// byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma dngos po 'dir 'ga' zhig 'du shes sam/ nye bar btags pa 'am ming ngam/ tha snyad dam/ mngon par shes par gyur pa yin nam/
483b2(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang gzugs zhes bya ba gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba gang
483b3(mdo 'grel): yin pa 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i byar gang yin pa 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po der glo bur du ming du btags pa yin par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
483b4(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar ljags na ni gzugs zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa 'di dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
483b5(mdo 'grel): par shes pa zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar du gang legs pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang nye bar bzung nas ming dang 'du shes dang btags pa dang /
483b6(mdo 'grel): rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du dmigs pa kho na lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/
484a1(mdo 'grel): 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po la gzugs zhes bya bar ming dang 'du shes dang / 'dogs pa dang / rjes su thu snyad 'dogs par byed pa la/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ de gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid
484a2(mdo 'grel): yin nam btags pa tsam du zad/ gsol pa/ btags pa tsam du bas so// bcom ldan 'dus btags pa tsam du bas legs so// byams pa 'o na gzugs zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang
484a3(mdo 'grel): nye bar gzung nas ming dang 'du shes dang 'dogs pa dang rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du dmigs zhes de ltar sems/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
484a4(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid yin nam btags pa tsam du zad/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das btags pa tsam du bas lags so// bcom ldan 'das btags pa tsam du bas
484a5(mdo 'grel): legs so// byams pa 'o myong ji ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o zhes ji ltar de ji snyam du sems
484a6(mdo 'grel): byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te gzugs ming dang 'du shes dang brda' dang btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam kho na lags la/ bcom ldan 'das gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
484b1(mdo 'grel): dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ming dang 'du shes dang brda dang btags pa dang tha snyad tsam kho na lags na/ de ltar na ming dang 'du shes dang brda dang btags pa dang tha snyad tsam zhes bgyi
484b2(mdo 'grel): ba gang legs pa 'di gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du dmigs pa kho na ri mi 'gyur lags sam/ de ltar ming dang 'du shes dang brda dang btags pa dang tha snyad tsam zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa 'di tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
484b3(mdo 'grel): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid du dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs
484b4(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba'i ming dang 'du shes dang / brda dang btags pa dang / tha snyid tsam kho na gang yin pa dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang
484b5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang 'du shes dang brda dang btags pa dang tha snyad tsam kho na gang yin pa de la ci gang skye ba 'am 'jig pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byung ba yod dam
484b6(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'o ni khyod 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang /
485a1(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa'o snyam du gang las sems par 'gyur/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci rnam pa thams cad du mtshan
485a2(mdo 'grel): nyid thams cad kyis gzugs ma mchis pa kho na lags sum/ bcom ldan 'das ci rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs
485a3(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi chos rnams ma mchis pa kho na lugs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis gzugs med do zhes nga mi smra'o// byams pa rnam pa
485a4(mdo 'grel): thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam por shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med do zhes nga mi smra'o// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom
485a5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan/
485a6(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'jig rten gyi brda dang / tha snyad kyis gzugs yod kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no// byams pa 'jig rten gyi brda dang / tha snyad kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
485b1(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yod kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don
485b2(mdo 'grel): 'tshal ba ltar na ngon dam par dbyings 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ de ji ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan mo'i dngos po gang la gzugs shes bgyi bar glo bur du ming du 'dogs par 'gyur/ 'du byed kyi
485b3(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du 'dogs par ji ltar 'gyur/ gal te don dam
485b4(mdo 'grel): par ma mchis na ni 'o na brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings su yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po ni brjod du mya mchis pa'i dbyings zhes bgyir mi rung lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
485b5(mdo 'grel): pa/ byams pa de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings su shes rab 'jug pa de'i tshe 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang
485b6(mdo 'grel): la gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa
486a1(mdo 'grel): 'di khyod kyis dmigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ byams pa rnam grangs 'dris 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang yin pa de brjod du med pa'i dbyings kyang ma
486a2(mdo 'grel): yin la/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan pa yang ma yin par rig par bya'o// byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po der gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya bo dang / 'du
486a3(mdo 'grel): shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa gang yin pa 'di brjod du med pa'i dbyings yin du
486a4(mdo 'grel): zin na ni 'o na byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bor 'gyur zhing bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro// byamos pa gal te
486a5(mdo 'grel): 'du byed kyi mtshon ma'i dngos po las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan yin du zin na ni 'o na mtshan ma de yang mi dmigs na/ ji ltar brjod du med pa'i dbyings de rtogs par 'gyur ram/ byams pa rnam grangs
486a6(mdo 'grel): 'dis kyang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan pa yang ma yin/ gang la gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam
486b1(mdo 'grel): par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa gang yin pa 'di las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan ma yin par rig par bya'o// byams pas gsol pa/
486b2(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' brjod du ma mchis pa dbyings dang 'brel par shes rab 'jug par gnas pa ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs zhes bgyi ba dang / tshor ba zhes bgyi
486b3(mdo 'grel): ba dang / 'du shes zhes bgyi ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bgyi ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa ste mi dmigs na/ bcom
486b4(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das ci mchis pa mi dmigs lags sam/ 'on te ma mchis pa mi dmigs pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/
486b5(mdo 'grel): byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de ni yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid gang yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa gang gi tshe khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la rnam par rtog pa de'i tshe 'du
486b6(mdo 'grel): byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de mngon par rtogs pa rnams kyis bzung bar 'gyur ram/ gang gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang 'brel bar shes rab 'jug par gnas te/ rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe
487a1(mdo 'grel): rnam par mi rtog par bzung bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de ltar yin na 'di lta ste/ 'du byed kyi
487a2(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma'i dngos po gang du gzugs zhes bya ba drang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes
487a3(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa gang yin pa de rnam par rtog pa tsam du zad dam/ rnam par rtog pa tsam nyid ngo // de de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa rnams
487a4(mdo 'grel): dang 'brel par gyur pi na gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
487a5(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du mying du btags pa gang yin pa de la yod pa gang yin gang yod pa ni dmigs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das la byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang
487a6(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa la zhugs pas gzugs rab tu dbye ba la btags pa rnam pa du zhig tu rtogs par bgyi/ tshor ba dang /
487b1(mdo 'grel): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa rnam pa du zhig tu rtogs par bgyi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'/
487b2(mdo 'grel): stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos rab tu dbye ba mkhas po la zhugs pas gzugs rab tu dbye ba la zhugs pa'i brtags pa rnam pa gsum du rtogs
487b3(mdo 'grel): par bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i brtags pa yang rnam pa gsum du rtogs par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'di
487b4(mdo 'grel): dag ni kun tu brtags pa'i gzugs so// 'di dag ni rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs so// 'di dag ni chos nyid kyi gzugs so// 'di lta ste/ 'di dag ni kun du brtags pa'i tshor ba'o// 'di ni rnam par
487b5(mdo 'grel): brtags pa'i tsho ba'o// 'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba'o// 'di lta ste/ 'di ni kun du brtags pa'i 'du shes so// 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du shes so// 'di ni chos nyid kyi 'du shes so// 'di lta ste/ 'di
487b6(mdo 'grel): ni kun du brtags pa'i 'du byed rnams so// 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du byed rnams so// 'di ni chos nyid kyi 'du byed rnams so// 'di lta ste/ 'di ni kun du brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o// 'di ni rnam
488a1(mdo 'grel): par brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o// 'dun chos nyid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// 'di lta ste/ 'di dag ni kun tu brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go// 'di dag ni
488a2(mdo 'grel): rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// 'di dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes bya'o// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kun du brtags pa'i gzugs
488a3(mdo 'grel): ni gang lags/ rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs ni gang lags/ chos nyid kyi gzugs ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kun du brtags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
488a4(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes pa dang / kun tu brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar ni gang lags// rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ni gang lags/ chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gang
488a5(mdo 'grel): lpags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa gang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming dang 'du shes dang brtags pa dang tha snyad la brten nas gzugs
488a6(mdo 'grel): kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su rtog pa 'di ni kun du brtags pa'i gzugs so// byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes
488b1(mdo 'grel): bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang / 'du shes dang / brtags pa dang / tha snyad la brten nas/ tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'du shes kyi
488b2(mdo 'grel): ngo bo nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su rtogs pa 'di ni kun tu brtags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
488b3(mdo 'grel): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o// 'di dag ni kun du brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rnam par rtog pa tsam gyi chos nyid la gnas pa'i
488b4(mdo 'grel): rnam par rtog pa la brten nas mngon par brjod de/ gang la 'di ni gzugs so zhes bya bo dang / tshor ba'o zhes bya ba dang / 'du shos so zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams so zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'o/
488b5(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar zhes bya ba'i ming dang 'du shes dang btags pa dang tha snyad gang yin pa 'di ni rnam par brtags po'i gzugs so// 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i
488b6(mdo 'grel): tshor ba'o// 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du shes so// 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du byed rnams so// 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o// 'di dag ni rnam par brtags pa'i
489a1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos nyid dang / chos gnas
489a2(mdo 'grel): pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / kun brtags pa'i gzugs des rnam par brtagasu pa'i gzugs rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang / ther zug ther zug gi dus su ngo bo nyid med pa kho na dang / chos bdag med pa
489a3(mdo 'grel): dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni chos nyid kyi gzugs so// 'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o// 'di dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs
489a4(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs gsum po 'di dag la rdzas su ma mchis par lta ba'i gzugs ni gang lags/ rdzas su ma mchis pa yang ma
489a5(mdo 'grel): lags la rdzas su mchis pa yang ma lcogs shing don dam pas rab tu phye ba ni gang lpags/ tshor ba gsum po 'di dag dang / 'du shes rnam pa gsum po 'di dag dang / 'du byed rnam pa gsum po 'di
489a6(mdo 'grel): ngag dang / rnam par shes pa gsum po 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du gsum po 'di dag las rdzas su ma mchis pa ni gang lags/ rdzas su mchis pa ni gang lags/ rjes su ma
489b1(mdo 'grel): mchis pa yang ma lags la rdzas su mchis pa yang ma lags shing don dam pas rab tu phye ba de dag ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa gang kun du brtags pa'i gzugs
489b2(mdo 'grel): de ni rdzus su med par blta bar bya'o// rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa rdzas su yod pa'i phyir rdzas su yod par blta bar bya ste/ rang dbang du gyur pa'i phyir ni ma yin no//
489b3(mdo 'grel): gang chos nyid kyi gzugs de ni rdzas su med pa yang ma yin rdzas su yod pa yang ma yin zhing don dam pas rab tu phye bar blta bar bya'o// byams pa gang kun du brtags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes
489b4(mdo 'grel): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / kun du brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi byar de dag ni rdzas su med par blta bar bya'o// gang rnam par brtags pa'i tshor ba dang
489b5(mdo 'grel): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / gang rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag na rnam par rtog pa rdzas su yod pa'i phyir rdzas su yod par blta bar bya
489b6(mdo 'grel): ste/ rang dbang du gyur pa'i phyir ni ma yin no// byams pa gang chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / byams pa gang chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos
490a1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi bar de dag nA rdzas smra med pa yang ma yin la rdzas su yod pa yang ma yin zhing don dam pas rab tu phye bar dalta bar bya'o// byams pas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs zhes/
490a2(mdo 'grel): bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di lta ste/ tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
490a3(mdo 'grel): kyi bar zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs nas 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su
490a4(mdo 'grel): med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di lta ste tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba drang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar zhes bya ba de
490a5(mdo 'grel): ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams po 'di ji snyam du sems/ kun tu brtags pa'i gzugs la rdzas su med pa nyid gang yin pa
490a6(mdo 'grel): de gzugs yin nam 'on te ma yini/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// de la gzugaso zhes bya ba ming dang 'du shes dang btags pa dang tha snyad tsam gang yin pa de ci gzugs yin nam
490b1(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags/ byams pa rnam grangs des kyang gang kun brtags pa'i gzugs de gzugs kyang ma yin la gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin te/ gang gzugs kyang ma
490b2(mdo 'grel): yin la gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa ste/ nges 'di la dgongs nas 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal par
490b3(mdo 'grel): rig par bya'o// byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang la brten nas gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming dang btigs pa dang tha snyad du gyur pa rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs rdzas su yod pa nyid gang yin pa
490b4(mdo 'grel): de ci gang gzugasnga ma yin pa yin nama?/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs de nyid la kun du brtags pa'i gzugs des
490b5(mdo 'grel): de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin zhing de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa gang yin pa de gzugs yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar gang rnam par brtags pa'i
490b6(mdo 'grel): gzugs de yang gzugs kyang ma yin la gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin te/ gang gzugs kyang ma yin la gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa ste/ ngas de la dgongs nas 'di lta ste/
491a1(mdo 'grel): gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya'o// byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang chos nyid kyi gzugs bdag med
491a2(mdo 'grel): bsku rab tu bye ba'i gzugs de ci gang gzugs yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// chos nyid kyi gzugs de nyid gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin nam
491a3(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lpags so// byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang chos nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa de yang gzugs kyang ma yin lnga gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin te/ gang gzugs
491a4(mdo 'grel): kyang ma yin la gzugs med pa yang ma yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa ste/ ngas de de la dgongs nas 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du
491a5(mdo 'grel): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
491a6(mdo 'grel): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ltar gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhos shing de ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs
491b1(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag la gnyis su ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pa mtha' gnyis spangs nas dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pas yongs su shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/ spong ba'i mtshan
491b2(mdo 'grel): nyid ni ji lta bu/ mngon sum du bgyid pa'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/ sgom pari mtshan nyid ni ji lta bur blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' shes
491b3(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtha' gnyis spangs nas 'di ltar dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pas gang gzugs yongs su shes pa yang ma yin/ yongs su mi shes pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs
491b4(mdo 'grel): su shes pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yongs su shes pa yang ma yin/ yongs su mi shes pa yang ma yin pa
491b5(mdo 'grel): de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o// gang gzugs spong ba yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o// gang tshor po dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
491b6(mdo 'grel): kyi bar du spong ba yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o// gang gzugs spong ba mngon sum du byed pa yang ma yin la mngon sum du mi byed pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i mngon sum du byed pa'o// gang gzugs
492a1(mdo 'grel): spang ba'i phyir lam sgom pa yang ma yin mi sgom pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i sgom pa'o// gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas
492a2(mdo 'grel): kyi chos rnams kyi bar spang ba'i phyir lam sgom pa yang ma yin mi sgom pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i sgom pa'o// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
492a3(mdo 'grel): pa la spyod pa de lta bu'i yongs su 'tshal ba dang / spong ba dang / mngon sum du bgyid pa dang / sgom pa dang / ldan pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang
492a4(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni zab bo// mchog tu zab bo// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'daso ba 'di ltar
492a5(mdo 'grel): zab pa dang mchog tu zab pa logs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa yang
492a6(mdo 'grel): ma yin/ mya ngan las ma 'das pa yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir zab pa dang / mchog tu zab pa zhes bya'o// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las
492b1(mdo 'grel): 'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma lags/ mya ngan las mya 'das pa yang ma lags pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa gzhan gyi don las brtsams te 'khor ba yongs su
492b2(mdo 'grel): mi gtong bas mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin no// bdag gi don las brtsams te mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong bas mya ngan las ma 'das pa yang ma yin no// byams pas gsol ba/ bcom
492b3(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi don las brtsams te 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong na/ de 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong byas ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su gtang bar mi 'gyur/ bcom
492b4(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi don las brtsams te/ mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong na 'di ji ltar 'khor bu yongs su gtong bar mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
492b5(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal pa/ byamos pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'khor ba la 'khor ba nyid du rnam par mi rtog mya ngan las 'das pa la mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du rnam par mi
492b6(mdo 'grel): rtog ste/ de de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'ongs pa de dag mnyam pas mnyam par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'khor ba la 'khor ba nyid du rnam par mi rtog pas
493a1(mdo 'grel): 'khor ba las yid 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du mi rtog pas mya ngan las 'das pa la yang yongs su mi rtog par rig par
493a2(mdo 'grel): bya'o// byams pas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pas 'khor ba ji ltar ma gtang ba de ltar blangs
493a3(mdo 'grel): po yang ma mchis shing mya ngan las 'das pa ji ltar ma gotang ba de ltar ma blangs pa yang ma mchis par mi 'gyur pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das gal te blangs pa ma mchis na ji ltar ma gtang ba lag
493a4(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa nga ni 'di ltar 'khor ba len to zhe 'am mi len to zhes mi smra'o// mya ngan las 'das pa len to zhe 'am mi len to zhes mi smra'o// byams pa 'on kyang shes
493a5(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la dmigs pa'i ye shes sems la dbang thob pas thabs la mkhas byas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
493a6(mdo 'grel): gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'khor ba bstan pa'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'khor ba yongs su mi gtang ba'o zhes nga smra'o// stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i
493b1(mdo 'grel): dbyings la gnas pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong ba'o zhes nga smra'o// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dus pa ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom
493b2(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sangs
493b3(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du gang yin pa dang / gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi
493b4(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos de dag dang stong pa nyid de'i dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyis su med pa spros pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/ byams pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dus par blta'o//
493b5(mdo 'grel): byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nyan thos thams cad gcig tu nges par gtan du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa lags som/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pA/ byams pa de ni
493b6(mdo 'grel): ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'jig rten 'di ni khams sna tshogs pa khams du ma ste/ khams sna tshogs can der 'byung ba ni sems can gyi rigs dang rang bzhin ming du dmi gos te/ byams
494a1(mdo 'grel): b+ha gang thog ma nyid nas bzang po'i bye brag don du gnyer ba ste/ bzang po'i bye brag nyid thob byar 'gyur ba yang song / gang thog ma nyid nas dman pa'i bye brag don du gnyer ba ste/ dman
494a2(mdo 'grel): pa nyid thob pa de nyid kyi tsheg par 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi rnam pA de lta bu yang yod/ gang thog ma nyid nas dman pa'i bye brag don du gnyer ba ste/ dman pa'i bye brag thob pa de tsam gyis chog par mi 'dzin gyi de'i gong du
494a3(mdo 'grel): bzang po'i bye brag tshol zhing bzang po 'thob par 'gyur pa'i rigs kyi bye brag de lta bu yang yod // byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi rigs kyis rnam pa gsum po gang lags pa de dgra bcom
494a4(mdo 'grel): pa nyid thob nas bla nu med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer yang skye ba ma mchis pas ji ltar thob par 'gyur/ sgrub pa nyid de'i skye ba lags par ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa lags/
494a5(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de'i skye ba ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis skye bar nga mi smra'o// de'i skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang sprul pa dang yongs su bsgyur ba'o zhes du 'dogs so//
494a6(mdo 'grel): byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar thog ma nyid nas bzang po'i bye brag don du gnyer zhing bzang po'i bye brag nyid thob par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam pa rlabs
494b1(mdo 'grel): blo che dang / che ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa rlabs po che ni gang lags/ che ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid ni glang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
494b2(mdo 'grel): kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams brgya byin nyid dang / 'jig rten skyong ba nyid dang / 'khor los sgyur ba nyid thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa
494b3(mdo 'grel): thams cad dang don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi de dag la ma chags shing mi 'dzin pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
494b4(mdo 'grel): bsam pa rlabs po che'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma chags pa'i bde ba dang / 'dzin pa med pa'i bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'dus pa'i bde ba semasna can thams cad dang thun mong du bya bar 'dod cing
494b5(mdo 'grel): dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong ba che ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid ngu blta bar bya'o// de nas bcom
494b6(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnams ni ngo mtshar rmad du
495a1(mdo 'grel): byung ba lags so// byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba lags s+ho// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos ngo mtshar rmad
495a2(mdo 'grel): du byung ba rnams la slob phyir 'tshal bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ba lags so// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'dus
495a3(mdo 'grel): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis te/ de dog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ma mdzad/ rang sangs rgya ste dang / dgra bcom pa dang / phyir mi 'ong
495a4(mdo 'grel): bapa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/ de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/ gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang
495a5(mdo 'grel): ma bgyis na chos de dag la 'di dag ni sems can dmyal ba pa'o// 'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o// 'di ni gshin+da NAM'i 'jig rten po'o// 'di ni lha'o// 'di ni mi'o// las 'di ni sems can dmyal ba
495a6(mdo 'grel): dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten par 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni mir 'gyur ro// las 'di ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni sum cu rtsa gsum dang /
495b1(mdo 'grel): 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga'a'u dang / gzhan 'phrul dadang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang /
495b2(mdo 'grel): 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams dang / mi sbed pa dang / mi gdung ba dang /
495b3(mdo 'grel): legs mthong drang / rab lta dang / 'og min gyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'angs ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yus skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med
495b4(mdo 'grel): 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom po dang / rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni byang chub
495b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar tha dad du dbye bi 'am/ rnam par 'god par
495b6(mdo 'grel): yang ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa la ni bgyi ba gang yang ma mchis te/ bgyi ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/ gshin
496a1(mdo 'grel): rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/ mir skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul
496a2(mdo 'grel): dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chud dang / tshad med 'od dang 'od gsal dang // ge chang dang
496a3(mdo 'grel): tshad med dge dang / dge rgyus dang / smon med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang / mi spong ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / legs mthong dang / ba lta
496a4(mdo 'grel): dang 'og min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yis skye mched dab cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med tshun skye mched kyi d+har skyed
496a5(mdo 'grel): 'am/ rgyun du zhugs pa'o 'bras bu thob par 'gyur pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur bya 'am/
496a6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam la spyod par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ thob par gyur nas sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su
496b1(mdo 'grel): 'grol bur 'gyur ro// zhes bgyi ba de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bkra' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin
496b2(mdo 'grel): no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa la ni las kyang med/ bya ba yang med/ 'bras bu yang med na/ 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo 'phags pa'i cho so la mi mkhas
496b3(mdo 'grel): pa rnams kyis chos rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mi shes te/ phyin ci log las byung ba'i sems kyis las sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pas de dag gi lus rnam pa de bzhin du mngon
496b4(mdo 'grel): par 'grub ste/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ mi 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang
496b5(mdo 'grel): dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga'o dang / gzhan 'phrul dbong byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs tshun dang / 'od rgyung dang / tshad med 'od dang
496b6(mdo 'grel): 'od gsol dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dag dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang / mi spong ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / legs
497a1(mdo 'grel): mthong dang / rab sgra dang / 'og min gyi lha 'am/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'ang+gA
497a2(mdo 'grel): shes med min skye mched kyi lha'i nang du lus mngon par 'grub ste/ dngos po med pa la ni las sam/ bya ba 'am/ 'bras bu med de/ dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa nyid do// rab 'byor de la 'di
497a3(mdo 'grel): skang du dngos po med pa la ni bya ba gang yang med de/ bya ba gang gis sems can dmyas par 'gro ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ mir skye ba 'am/ rgyal
497a4(mdo 'grel): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'bab bral dang / dge' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ras dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa dang / tshangs
497a5(mdo 'grel): 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chang dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can
497a6(mdo 'grel): dang / mi spong ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / legs mthong dang / rab lta dang / 'og min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zang
497b1(mdo 'grel): med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
